title: Manchu Man's Semiformal Court Robe (chi-fu)
description: Dragon robe similar to 48.2.1 and 2, but of apple green satin brocaded in blue, brown, green, shades of rose and gold.  Same border design and same colors as in 42.8.1.  Neck bound with narrow black satin, cuffs with narrow green silk. Slit front and back.  Lined with faded pink silk and interlines(?).
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
